select * from ( select r.rqst_hstry_num as rqst_hstry_num, r.state as state, r.emp_num as emp_num, d.code_name as dept_code, d.code_value as dept, e.emp_name as emp_name, v.vctn_start_date as start_date,v.vctn_end_date as end_date, vt.vctn_name||'('||vctn_time||'h,'||vt.deduction_day||'일)' as special_note , v.vctn_reason as request_reason, r.request_type, r.approver_note ,r.application_date from request_history r join vacation v on r.request_num = v.vctn_num and r.request_type='V' join vacation_type vt on v.vctn_type_num = vt.vctn_type_num join emp e on r.emp_num = e.emp_num join code_table d on e.dept = d.code_name union all
select r.rqst_hstry_num as rqst_hstry_num, r.state as state, r.emp_num as emp_num, d.code_name as dept_code, d.code_value as dept, e.emp_name as emp_name ,a.go_work as start_date,a.leave_work as end_date, null as special_note, null as request_reason, r.request_type, r.approver_note ,r.application_date from request_history r join attendance a on r.request_num = a.att_num and r.request_type='A' join emp e on r.emp_num = e.emp_num join code_table d on e.dept = d.code_name union all
select r.rqst_hstry_num as rqst_hstry_num, r.state as state, r.emp_num as emp_num, d.code_name as dept_code, d.code_value as dept, e.emp_name as emp_name, ws.go_work as start_date,ws.leave_work as end_date, null as special_note, ws.remarks as request_reason, r.request_type, r.approver_note ,r.application_date from request_history r join work_schedule ws on r.request_num = ws.work_sch_num join emp e on r.emp_num = e.emp_num join code_table d on e.dept = d.code_name ) where to_char(application_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') >= #{startDate} and to_char(application_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') <= #{endDate} order by rqst_hstry_num desc
